name: Suki Desu Suzuki-kun: 4nin no Suzuki-kun
storyline: The player can choose to play as either Chihiro or Sayaka. The game follows an original story not present in the manga, where the main cast visits a vacation villa on summer holidays and encounter two other Sukukis.
summary: Suki Desu Suzuki-kun!! 4nin no Suzuki-kun is a Nintendo DS game based off the manga Suki Desu Suzuki-kun.
